title: BEAUTIFUL VIEW, HUGE BALCONY! *2 BED 2 BATH  DELUXE AVAILABLE 12/17*
posting_body: ['Luxury returns to Mayfield Heights!', 'Nestled in a beautiful setting overlooking the Chagrin Valley, Gates Mills Place is a beautiful and unique apartment community near Cleveland.', 'Extensive upgrades have been made to all lobbies, welcome centers, and suites.', 'Our common areas are all newly renovated and have all new lighting as well.', 'Many amenities await you here!', 'You will enjoy garage and carport parking, sparkling indoor and outdoor pools, six fitness centers, libraries, and the on-site conveniences of a beauty salon, convenience store, and coffee shop.', 'We also offer online rental payment and maintenance requests.', 'You have shopped for the best and now you have found it at the all new Gates Mills Place! Visit us today and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for... and more!', '*Must be 21 or older', '*Must Have good credit, criminal & rental history', 'Call us today to see your new home at', 'show contact info', 'Indoor Pool Open Year-Round', 'Outdoor Pool with Sundeck', 'Multiple Fitness Centers', 'Party Rooms for Private Use', 'Full Service Business Centers: Computers, Internet Access, Fax and Copy Machines', 'Customer Service Centers in Each Building', 'Beautiful Picnic Area', 'On-Site Salon and Convenience Store', 'All New Common Area Renovations Including Carpeting and Lighting', 'Free Wi-Fi in Lobby Common Areas', 'Coinless Laundry Centers', 'Fully Furnished Corporate Housing Available', 'Controlled Building Access', 'Indoor Parking Available', 'Near Public Transportation', 'Close to Local Freeways: I-271, I-480, I-90', 'Walk to Banks, Shopping, Retail and Restaurants', 'Award-Winning Mayfield City Schools', 'On-Site Management', 'On-Site Maintenance', '24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Online Rental Payment and Maintenance Requests', 'Preferred Employer Program and Senior Discount Available', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
